title: New research reveals shocking racist attacks and public refusal to help (Nottingham Trent University)
text: ( Source : Nottingham Trent University ) Thursday 15 October 2015 New research reveals shocking racist attacks and public refusal to help Muslims targeted by Islamophobic hate attacks are reluctant to report incidents of abuse and often
